gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Jazz 124, Hawks 122
gameRecap.excerpt: Utah defeats Atlanta, 124-122. For Utah, Keyonte George led the way with 25 points, four rebounds, five assists, and two steals while aided by Collin Sexton (21 points, four rebounds, six assists, two steals) and Johnny Juzang (career-high 19 points (five 3PM), three rebounds) in the victory. Dejounte Murray finished with 33 points (five 3PM), seven rebounds, nine assists, and two steals with Jalen Johnson tallying 26 points, five rebounds, and five assists for Atlanta in the losing effort. Utah improves to 29-37, while Atlanta moves to 29-37 in the loss.
